DOC.brief_summary: In physiological condition , spontaneous ventilation control blood carbon dioxide ( pH ) level . In healthy animal , extracorporeal carbon dioxide removal lead hypoventilation apnea ( Kolobow et al. , 1977 ) . During acute respiratory insufficiency , extracorporeal carbon dioxide removal may use control spontaneous ventilation , limit risk lung damage relieve dyspnea ( Crotti et al. , 2012 ) . However , little know spontaneous ventilation change response change extracorporeal carbon dioxide removal acute respiratory insufficiency , especially human . Aim study monitor change spontaneous ventilation awake patient treat extracorporeal gas exchange support acute respiratory insufficiency , response change extracorporeal carbon dioxide removal .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Spontaneous Ventilation Response Changes Extracorporeal Carbon Dioxide Removal
DOC.criteria: Acute Respiratory Insufficiency Extracorporeal gas exchange support The patient spontaneously breathe ( include assist ventilation ) age 18 yr
